00030 template<class new_window_type = window_base, class p1 = void_, class p2 = void_, class p3 = void_, class p4 = void_, class p5 = void_, class p6 = void_, class p7 = void_, class p8 = void_, class p9 = void_, class p10 = void_> struct new_t {
00031 
00032     new_t(
00033             const wnd_init & init = wnd_init() ,
00034             const p1 & a1 = p1(),
00035             const p2 & a2 = p2(),
00036             const p3 & a3 = p3(),
00037             const p4 & a4 = p4(),
00038             const p5 & a5 = p5(),
00039             const p6 & a6 = p6(),
00040             const p7 & a7 = p7(),
00041             const p8 & a8 = p8(),

00043             const p10 & a10 = p10() ) 
00044         : init(init)
00045         , v1(a1)
00046         , v2(a2)
00047         , v3(a3)
00048         , v4(a4)
00049         , v5(a5)
00050         , v6(a6)
00051         , v7(a7)
00052         , v8(a8)
00053         , v9(a9)
00054         , v10(a10)
00055     {}

00059     wnd_init init;
00060     p1 v1;
00061     p2 v2;
00062     p3 v3;
00063     p4 v4;
00064     p5 v5;
00065     p6 v6;
00066     p7 v7;
00067     p8 v8;
00068     p9 v9;
00069     p10 v10;

00071 
00072 /* The following need to compile:
00073 
00074     new_(5);
00075     new_( L"title", 5);
00076 
00077     new_<form>(5);
00078     new_<form>( L"title", 5);
00079     new_<form>( rectangle(0,0,10,10), 5);
00080     new_<form>( wnd_init().rect(0,0,10,10).text(L"tt"), 5);
00081     new_<form>();
00082     new_( wnd_init().rect(0,0,50,50), 10);
00083     new_( wnd_init().rect(0,0,50,50), 10, 2.4);
00084     new_( wnd_init().rect(0,0,50,50), 10, (wchar_t*)L"dummy");
00085     new_( L"title", 10, (wchar_t*)L"dummy");
00086     new_( rectangle(0,0,10,10), 10, (wchar_t*)L"dummy");
00087     new_( L"tt", 10, (wchar_t*)L"dummy");
00088     new_( L"tt", 10, (wchar_t*)L"dummy", 3.2);
00089 
00090     new_<form>( wnd_init().rect(0,0,50,50), 10, 2.4);
00091     new_<form>( wnd_init().rect(0,0,50,50), 10, (wchar_t*)L"dummy");
00092     new_<form>( L"title", 10, (wchar_t*)L"dummy");
00093     new_<form>( rectangle(0,0,10,10), 10, (wchar_t*)L"dummy");
00094     new_<form>( L"tt", 10, (wchar_t*)L"dummy");
00095     new_<form>( L"tt", 10, (wchar_t*)L"dummy", 3.2);
00096 
00097 
00098     Hopefully, something like this should compile as well:
00099     new_( wnd_init().rect(0,0,50,50), 10, L"dummy");
00100 
00101     However, VC treates L"dummy" as const wchart[6]. On top of that, it makes p2 = const wchart[6] and generates
00102     a compile time error "cannot specify explicit initializer for arrays". No matter what I do, I still can't initialize it.
00103 
00104     I guess one solution is to have a wrapper class, like wrap<p1> v1; wrap<p2> v2; etc. 
00105     and for c-like strings, internally hold std strings
00106 */
00107 
00153 inline new_t<> new_() { return new_t<>(); }

00177 template<class base> struct window_instance_t : base, virtual window_top {
00178 
00179     window_instance_t(wnd_id_type hwnd) : window_top(hwnd) {}
00180 
00181     template<class type> window_instance_t(wnd_id_type hwnd, const new_t<type> & args) 
00182         : window_top(hwnd,args.init) {}
00183 
00184     template<class type, class p1> window_instance_t(wnd_id_type hwnd, const new_t<type,p1> & args) 
00185         : window_top(hwnd,args.init), base(args.v1) {}
00186     template<class type, class p1, class p2> window_instance_t(wnd_id_type hwnd, const new_t<type,p1,p2> & args) 
00187         : window_top(hwnd,args.init), base(args.v1, args.v2) {}
00188     template<class type, class p1, class p2, class p3> window_instance_t(wnd_id_type hwnd, const new_t<type,p1,p2,p3> & args) 
00189         : window_top(hwnd,args.init), base(args.v1, args.v2, args.v3) {}
00190     template<class type, class p1, class p2, class p3, class p4> window_instance_t(wnd_id_type hwnd, const new_t<type,p1,p2,p3,p4> & args) 
00191         : window_top(hwnd,args.init), base(args.v1, args.v2, args.v3, args.v4) {}
00192     template<class type, class p1, class p2, class p3, class p4, class p5> window_instance_t(wnd_id_type hwnd, const new_t<type,p1,p2,p3,p4,p5> & args) 
00193         : window_top(hwnd,args.init), base(args.v1, args.v2, args.v3, args.v4, args.v5) {}
00194 
00195 };

00197 struct create_window_base {
00198     virtual ~create_window_base() {}
00199     virtual window_top * create(wnd_id_type h) = 0;
00200 };
00201 
00202 template<class window, class param> struct create_window : create_window_base {
00203     param p;
00204     create_window(const param& p) : p(p) {}
00205 
00206     virtual window_top * create(wnd_id_type h) { 
00207         window_top * w = new window(h, p); 
00208         return w;
00209     }
00210 
00211 };
